review: Not overly impressed.  Difficult to use.  Prefer something that automatically connects to our router rather than having to turn the phone on each time.
author: Bret Taylor "bret@cableone.net"

review: It works very well, Excellent A+
author: Renny

review: I am loving this product.  I would and have recommended it to others.
author: Anita Richardson

review: These are wonderful little gadgets.  I bought one for myself, and one for my college student child to take to school.
author: AnnieMac

review: A very good relation between quality and price.
author: Gustavo

review: Too hard to setup. Two of my devices not recognized and finally did work with laptop. Not user friendly and no instruction included. Spent way to much time screwing around trying to connect.
author: William A. Yates
